snippet.title: Mad Experiments: Escape Room Teaser - Multiplayer puzzle game on Steam
snippet.description:
Get it on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1201550/Mad_Experiments_Escape_Room/
Get it on Humble Bundle: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/search?sort=bestselling&search=MAD%20EXPERIMENTS

Mad Experiments: Escape Room is an immersive and intense escape room experience online.
In a team of up to 6 players or solo: collect clues, solve mind-blowing puzzles and unlock the secrets of this strange place in the allotted time.

- Play with up to 6 players
- Unique visual puzzles and riddles
- An intriguing atmosphere reinforced by the sumptuous decor and musical background
- Cooperative and narrative puzzle game where you uncover chapters of Professor Cheshire's haunting story and his experiments on the human mind

www.playtogether-studio.com
